answers.answer: You can have some caffeine! Granted soda isnt the healthiest thing in the world but in moderation its fine. If you feel like a bottled soda is too much just drink a canned one. Im a mt dew junkie but i cut myself down to 1 or 2 a week
I guess I'm feeling guilty today cause I've drank 2 bottles!!! It's literally harder to give up than smoking!!!

I used to drink so much soda before I was pregnant. And I asked my doctor if it was ok for me to have a soda a day because I get the worst headaches and she told me it was fine that I would have one soda a day of it got rid of my headaches.

I love my coffee and I did good not drinking it for quite a few months but I couldn't hold out any longer when I started getting free coffee at work. I drank pop with my daughter and she's just fine. I wouldn't worry too much about it, just don't overdo it.
I drank a lot of mountain dew my first pregnancy it's not exactly the greatest decision but it's not like it was monster or red bull

Just be careful, depending on your heritage it could be bad. I'm a 24 ftm and couldn't give up the soda,it was the only unhealthy thing in my diet but I now have gestational diabetes. It's the sugar not so much the caffeine to be worried about, I was having a soda a day and have now had to stop cold turkey all together :(

I drank so much soda it ain't funny, basically my whole life and I'm paying for it now with a yeast infection from beyond...I can't take it anymore water from here on out and no crap food. Believe me you don't want this problem it *****.
Lol I've drank so much water in the past four days I feel like I'm swimming.

question: So I am a faithful mellow yellow drinker, I just never have a taste for anything other. Every now and then I'll have a glass of juice say with breakfast. Of course since I am 6 weeks pregnant I have been drinking PLENTY of Apple/oragne/cranberry grape juice plus water but is it okay to enjoy at least one 20 fl oz of soda?!?! Not necessarily daily but just to fill my craving. I literally feel bad even taking a sip of soda. I am a first time mom so every move I make I question...please tell me there is someone who can relate and make me feel more confident in sipping soda
title: giving up soda
